prompt:
Image Prompt:
Create an image depicting a vibrant artistic scene that symbolizes the theological debate in arts between conservative and liberal Christian perspectives. The image should showcase contrasting elements such as traditional symbols of faith alongside modern artistic expressions. Include visual representations of theological controversies found in literature, with characters engaging in respectful dialogue and debate. Capture the essence of defending orthodoxy through creative works and Christian apologetics within a British media setting. Emphasize the complexity of artistic expression within doctrinal debates, blending traditional and contemporary styles in a visually compelling and thought-provoking composition.
